channel.title: TorvaPkz trade problems
channel.description:
Okay, i started up a server with the TorvaPkz source and whenever we try to trade stuff to new players it won't accept the trade... it doesn't give any errors in the cmd or anything.We don't know where to look in the source files to fix the problem.... Any ideas?
Please let me know.

item.title: TorvaPkz trade problems
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

gotta love my anti leeches

Read full topic

item.title: TorvaPkz trade problems
item.dc:creator: @skillingman8 skillingman8
item.description:
@skillingman8 wrote:

I fixed this, but i couldn’t remember how i fixed it to tell you, lololol. add me on msn ryan_yukon@hotmail.com and I’ll try to remember

Read full topic

item.title: TorvaPkz trade problems
item.dc:creator: @ArzonScape ArzonScape
item.description:
@ArzonScape wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:6, topic:428040”][quote author=David321 link=topic=530732.msg3876160#msg3876160 date=1325694514]

Its probably because admins cant trade.

If admins cant trade the trade screen wouldnt open …
[/quote]
Not necesarily… Someone might have changed it so that admins can see trades but just not accept them.[/quote]

We thought of that, we made regular accounts, with no player rights and it still won’t trade… The screen opens but all we can do is Decline…

[quote=“David321, post:2, topic:428040”][quote author=ArzonScape link=topic=530732.msg3876054#msg3876054 date=1325690413]
Okay, i started up a server with the TorvaPkz source and whenever we try to trade stuff to new players it won’t accept the trade… it doesn’t give any errors in the cmd or anything.We don’t know where to look in the source files to fix the problem… Any ideas?

Please let me know.
[/quote]

lol use another source. Tons of that like torvapkz![/quote]

And i would take another source, but i have added alot… unless you have one to recommend?

Read full topic

item.title: TorvaPkz trade problems
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

[quote=“David321, post:4, topic:428040”][quote author=kickingjamie link=topic=530732.msg3876145#msg3876145 date=1325693803]
Its probably because admins cant trade.
[/quote]

If admins cant trade the trade screen wouldnt open …[/quote]
Not necesarily… Someone might have changed it so that admins can see trades but just not accept them.

Read full topic
